text:
@parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I would have thought that COVID-19 would be the very last thing you'd want voters associating with Donald Trump. 

Although they certainly should… there's a reason we lead the world in infections and mortality, and it has everything to do with his poor judgement.
